snippet: To the relief of President François Hollande, his Socialist party and its leftist allies passed a measure aimed at preventing further debt crises without needing the votes of the center-right.
abstract: Lower house of French Parliament approves the ratification of a European budget discipline treaty by a large majority, with final adoption expected within days.
lead_paragraph: To the relief of President François Hollande, his Socialist party and its leftist allies passed a measure aimed at preventing further debt crises without needing the votes of the center-right.

headline.seo: France Assembly Approves Europe Budget Treaty
headline.main: French Assembly Approves European Budget Discipline Treaty
headline.print_headline: French Assembly Approves European Budget Discipline Treaty
